alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 3:53AM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Storm total accumulations of generally 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...North Central Kansas. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with reduced visibility. Snow will gradually decrease through the morning hours. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although limited blowing and drifting snow is likely, sustained north-northeast winds will only average 10 to 15 MPH, keeping significant drifting from being a major issue.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
